description: health canada and food drug agency biopharmaceutical regulatory requirements
full_summary:
## Procurement of Kaye  Temperature Mapping Datalogger
### Title Summary
As a follow-up to tender notice **Sollicitation # 23-58274**, the National Research Council Canada is soliciting proposals for the supply of Kaye Validator Dataloggers and accessories for the purpose of conforming to Health Canada’s biopharmaceutical regulatory requirements.

### Tender Details
|  **Information*** |  **Description** |
|  --- |  --- |
|  **Reference  Number** |  #cb-3-96661552 |
|  **Amendment** |  1 |
|  **Solicitation** |  23-58274 |
|  **Publication Date** |  2024-04-29 |
|  **Tender Closing Date** |  2024-05-13 14:00:00 |
|  **Tender Status** |  Expiré (Expired) |

### Product Requirements
The National Research Council Canada requires Kaye Val probe RT and accessories that conform to Health Canada’s biopharmaceutical regulatory requirements.

### Regions of Delivery
*   Canada

### Services Organisation
*   The National Research Council Canada
*   Address: 6120 Avenue Royalmount, Montreal, Quebec, H4P 2R3, Canada

### Contract Enquiries
*   For all contract enquiries, please contact Cindy Romain at:
    *   cindy.romain@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
    *   Telephone: 61352992748
    *   Fax: None

### Tender Documents
Please refer to the attached documents for additional information:
*   alpha_control_en_fr.pdf (Coincides with English Bid form)
*   acan_23_58274_alpha-controls_en.pdf (Coincides with English exemplary response)
*   acan_23-58274_alpha-controls_fr.pdf
*   npp_23-58274_alpha_control_en_fr.pdf 

### Industry Agreements
This procurement is subject to Canada’s Free Trade Agreements that include:

*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)  We have left more than 2 words when stating
